trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for installed and private font collections.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en basisklasse for installert og private skrift samlinger.

trans-unit.source: The FontCollection allows you to get a list of the font families contained in the collection with its <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Families%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: FontCollection gjør det mulig å hente en liste over skriftserier i samlingen med den <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Families%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Families%2A>

trans-unit.source: For additional information on fonts and text, including example code, see [Using Fonts and Text](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om skrifter og postteksten, inkludert eksempelkode, kan du se [ved hjelp av skrifter og tekst](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>ble bruker.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> </xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()`metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>referanser.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets the array of <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en rekke <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> objekter som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Gjør det mulig for et objekt å prøve å frigjøre ressurser og utføre andre operasjoner for opprydding før den er gode av datasanering.
